pkgmetadata.longdescription: The ngx-set-mist module extends the standard NGINX HttpRewriteModule's directive set to provide more functionalities like URI escaping and unescaping, JSON quoting, Hexadecimal/MD5/SHA1/Base32/Base64 digest encoding and decoding, random number generator, and more.

use.flag: Enable support for generating HMAC digests using dev-libs/openssl
